prompt: A chibi-style character in greyscale construction paper cut-out aesthetic, flat shapes with sharp edges and minimal shading, on transparent background. The face is solid black with no features. The body is in a front-facing centered dynamic pose with one arm raised toward heaven, one pointing to earth, chibi proportions with large multi-faceted crystalline head resembling a shifting merkaba structure suggesting stillness and motion through sharp, layered cut-outs with drawn depth. Hair or hexagonal crystalline appendages like sacred geometry horns incorporating hexagonal, fractal, metatron's cube patterns from sacred geometry symbolism. Outfit is unique: neutral grey and neutral grey structured solid robes with crystalline geometric patterns with flat with sharpie-style lines for stability and grounding, elaborate with shifting Earth element square motifs and foundational patterns and Flower of Life emblem on chest; texture flat with sharpie-style lines for depth. Include subtle accessory like caduceus of communication with intertwined geometric serpents with quantum spiraling energy emanations. Environmental effect: sacred geometric field creating geometric aura patterns around the character with subtle magical essence emanations like crystalline dust wisps and mineral particles. Emulate construction paper layering style exactly, but make this visually unique based on Governor ZAXANIN's profile: 'He who names things', Aethyr TOR, Earth element, Tarot The Magician, Sephirot Hod, Zodiac Gemini, embodying the essence: 'In ZAXANIN's presence, every element falls into a logical pattern an analytical clarity permeates th...' Resolution 512x512, optimized for layering in Enochian Cyphers game and WebGL rendering with TAP hypertoken metadata embedding.

visual_elements.pose: front-facing centered dynamic pose with one arm raised toward heaven, one pointing to earth
visual_elements.head_shape: large multi-faceted crystalline head resembling a shifting merkaba structure
visual_elements.body_style: angular geometric body with crystal-like facets, flattened with sharpie-like crease lines
visual_elements.motion_quality: suggesting stillness and motion through sharp, layered cut-outs with drawn depth
visual_elements.hair_style: hexagonal crystalline appendages like sacred geometry horns

outfit.base: structured solid robes with crystalline geometric patterns
outfit.texture: flat with sharpie-style lines for stability and grounding
outfit.details: Earth element square motifs and foundational patterns
outfit.magical_essence: crystalline dust wisps and mineral particles

visual_elements.accessory: caduceus of communication with intertwined geometric serpents
visual_elements.environment_effect: sacred geometric field with faint aura lines

profile_data.title: 'He who names things'
profile_data.essence: In ZAXANIN's presence, every element falls into a logical pattern an analytical clarity permeates the air, and communication flows with precise articulation.
profile_data.angelic_role: Power of Lexicon of Creation; commands emerald soldiers.
profile_data.form_description: A multi-faceted emerald-green crystalline structure that shifts between geometric precision and organic fluidity, representing the Earth element's dual nature of structure and growth
profile_data.color_reasoning: Emerald green represents Earth and Hod's intellectual brilliance, silver-white symbolizes Mercury's mental clarity and the Magician's transformative power
profile_data.geometry_reasoning: Hexagonal structures reflect sacred geometry, fractals represent infinite complexity of knowledge, Metatron's Cube embodies divine information systems
